TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BinaryFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class BinaryFormatter Implements IRemotingFormatter
type BinaryFormatter = class interface IRemotingFormatter interface IFormatter

summary.span: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in binary format.

span.span: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in binary format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和类实现接口以支持远程过程调用 (Rpc) 和接口 (由继承) 以支持序列化对象图。The and classes implement the interface to support remote procedure calls (RPCs), and the interface (inherited by the ) to support serialization of a graph of objects. 类还支持使用 Rpc对象，而无需使用功能。The class also supports RPCs with objects, without using the functionality. 在 Rpc 期间，接口允许两个单独的对象关系图的规范： 的对象要序列化的图和一个附加的图，包含传达有关 （适用于远程函数调用的信息的标头对象的数组例如，事务 ID 或方法签名）。During RPCs, the interface allows the specification of two separate object graphs: the graph of objects to serialize, and an additional graph that contains an array of header objects that convey information about the remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature). 使用的 Rpc分为两个不同的部分： 方法调用，发送到与包含调用的方法的远程对象的服务器，并从服务器发送到客户端状态的方法响应和响应从调用的方法的信息。RPCs that use the separate into two distinct parts: method calls, which are sent to the server with the remote object that contains the method called, and method responses, which are sent from the server to the client with the status and response information from the called method. 在方法调用的序列化过程的对象图的第一个对象必须支持接口。During serialization of a method call the first object of the object graph must support the interface. 若要反序列化方法调用，使用方法替换参数。To deserialize a method call, use the method with the parameter. 远程处理基础结构使用委托来生成支持的对象接口。The remoting infrastructure uses the delegate to produce an object that supports the interface. 当时，将调用委托，它返回的 URI 的远程对象使用调用的方法。When the invokes the delegate, it returns the URI of the remote object with the method that is being called. 在图中的第一个对象返回支持接口。The first object in the graph returned supports the interface. 方法响应的序列化过程的方法调用完全相同，除非该对象的第一个对象关系图必须支持接口。The serialization procedure for a method response is identical to that of a method call, except the first object of the object graph must support the interface. 若要反序列化方法响应，使用方法。To deserialize a method response, use the method. 以节省时间，调用方对象有关的详细信息不会发送到远程对象在方法调用期间。To save time, details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 这些详细信息改为从原始的方法调用传递到中的方法参数。These details are instead obtained from the original method call, which is passed to the method in the parameter. 返回的图中的第一个对象方法支持接口。The first object in the graph returned by the method supports the interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用二进制序列化进行反序列化不受信任的数据，则可能导致的安全风险。Using binary serialization to deserialize untrusted data can lead to security risks. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## 不成对的代理项Unpaired Surrogates 在二进制序列化情况下会丢失任何不成对的代理项字符。Any unpaired surrogate characters are lost in binary serialization. 例如，以下字符串包含一个高代理项 Unicode 字符`(\ud800`) 之间的两个`Test`单词：For example, the following string contains a high surrogate Unicode character `(\ud800`) in between the two `Test` words: `Test\ud800Test` 在序列化之前, 的字节数组的字符串如下所示：Before serialization, the byte array of the string is as follows: |字节数组值Byte Array Value|字符Character| |----------------------|---------------| |8484|TT| |101101|Ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| |5529655296|\ud800\ud800| |8484|TT| |101101|Ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| 反序列化后的高代理项 Unicode 字符将丢失：After deserialization, the high surrogate Unicode character is lost: |字节数组值Byte Array Value|字符Character| |----------------------|---------------| |8484|TT| |101101|Ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| |8484|TT| |101101|Ee| |115115|秒s| |116116|tt| ## Examples [!code-cpp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CPP/binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CS/binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/VB/binaryformatter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化新`BinaryFormatter`用于序列化或反序列化的对象从指定。Initializes a new `BinaryFormatter` for serialization or deserialization of objects from the specified . 使用指定的序列化或反序列化进程搜索要反序列化的对象类型注册的代理项。The serialization or deserialization process uses the specified to search for surrogates that are registered for the object types you want to deserialize. 代理项是可序列化和反序列化的特定类的对象的帮助器。Surrogates are helpers that serialize and deserialize objects of specific classes. 默认值无法处理从派生的对象序列化为远程处理目的。The default cannot handle the serialization of objects that derive from the for remoting purposes. 在远程处理的情况下，指定替换派生自对象与序列化指定的代理项选择器的对象。In a remoting situation the specified replaces the object derived from with a object that is serialized by the specified surrogate selector. 因此，如果你想要使用远程对象，设置`selector`参数的实例。Therefore, if you want to use remote objects, set the `selector` parameter to an instance of . 如果不需要使用代理项，将设置`selector`参数为`null`。If you do not need surrogates, set the `selector` parameter to be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供描述的源和给定的序列化流的目标以及要保留该上下文和调用方定义的其他上下文的序列化一种方法的枚举。The provides an enumeration that describes the source and the destination for a given serialized stream, as well as a way for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方对象有关的详细信息是在方法调用期间不发送到远程对象。Details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 相反，这些详细信息可从传递给当前方法中的原始方法调用中获得`methodCallMessage`参数。Instead, these details are obtained from the original method call that is passed to the current method in the `methodCallMessage` parameter. 在反序列化成功的顺序流中的当前位置必须开头的对象图。In order for deserialization to succeed the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标头仅用于特定远程处理应用程序。Headers are used only for specific remoting applications. 此方法使用，防止它调用不受信任代码; 只能直接调用方需要具有权限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果可以从部分受信任代码调用你的代码，则不要使用此方法。Do not use this method if your code can be called from partially trusted code. 在部分受信任的情况下，使用相反。In partially trusted scenarios, use instead. 在完全信任方案中，提供更好的性能比。In full trust scenarios, provides better performance than . 反序列化成功，流中的当前位置必须是开头的对象图。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: Deserializes a response to a remote method call from the provided .

returns.span: The deserialized response to the remote method call.

span.span: The deserialized response to the remote method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方对象有关的详细信息是在方法调用期间不发送到远程对象。Details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 相反，这些详细信息可从传递给当前方法中的原始方法调用中获得`methodCallMessage`参数。Instead, these details are obtained from the original method call that is passed to the current method in the `methodCallMessage` parameter. 此方法使用，防止它调用不受信任代码; 只能直接调用方需要具有权限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果可以从部分受信任代码调用你的代码，则不要使用此方法。Do not use this method if your code can be called from partially trusted code. 在部分受信任的情况下，使用相反。In partially trusted scenarios, use instead. 在完全信任方案中，提供更好的性能比。In full trust scenarios, provides better performance than . 反序列化成功，流中的当前位置必须是开头的对象图。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

exception.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
